title: 48 hour sale of graded, raw, hof, tough backs and even some low grade
author: Pete Pyro

posts.post_title: 48 hour sale of graded, raw, hof, tough backs and even some low grade
posts.post_content:
Same as last time. Great cards, great prices, fast shipping, happy customers :) Please wait for all 3 posts before replying. All raw cards come with plastic sleeve and hard case.  With the exception of low grade cards, most raw cards were graded 3.5-5 and I cracked them to collect the monster raw. I have since changed strategies to collecting my favorite card and back combos so I have plenty of excess to help me narrow my focus and buy more cards. Prices are pretty fair and firm, but I am willing to at least listen to offers. Extreme lowballs will get ignored. Paypal only, pm for addy. Here we go!

Frank Chance (Red Portrait) - Sweet Caporal 150 fac 30 - $140
